abstract: Editorial argues peace talks aiming to end civil war and humanitarian crisis in Yemen must focus on power-sharing political solution; repudiates America for selling Saudi Arabia weapons it has used in campaign which has killed thousands of civilians; asserts Sunni Arab nations must shift from proxy war with Iran to defeating new branch of Islamic State in Yemen.
lead_paragraph: Thousands have been killed, millions face food shortages and a security vacuum has allowed the Islamic State to expand.

headline.main: The Urgent Need for Peace in Yemen
headline.print_headline: The Urgent Need for Peace in Yemen

snippet: Thousands have been killed, millions face food shortages and a security vacuum has allowed the Islamic State to expand.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
